rule: The response should contain just the tag corresponding to the part of speech of the given word with no additional text.
input: sentence: She sells seashells by the seashore., word: seashore
validityText:
The input contains a valid English sentence "She sells seashells by the seashore." that is a single continuous string with allowable characters and punctuation. The word "seashore" is indeed an English word and is present in the given sentence as a single continuous string without spaces.

OK
